member.name: T:TrackableEntities.EF5.DbContextExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for DbContext to persist trackable entities.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.EF5.DbContextExtensions.ApplyChanges(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,TrackableEntities.ITrackable)
member.summary: Update entity state on DbContext for an object graph.
member.param: Used to query and save changes to a database

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.EF5.DbContextExtensions.ApplyChanges(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TrackableEntities.ITrackable})
member.summary: Update entity state on DbContext for more than one object graph.
member.param: Used to query and save changes to a database

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.EF5.DbContextExtensions.LoadRelatedEntities(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,TrackableEntities.ITrackable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load related entities for an object graph.
member.param: Used to query and save changes to a database
True to load all related entities, false to load only added entities

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.EF5.DbContextExtensions.LoadRelatedEntities(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TrackableEntities.ITrackable},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load related entities for more than one object graph.
member.param: Used to query and save changes to a database
True to load all related entities, false to load only added entities
